dataList.dlg: I know of ways to cut through a heart with elegance and eccentricity.
It's time again for a banquet of swordplay.
Be wary of those who have plenty of laughs and smiles to show. A sharp edge lurks beneath the deceptive expression.
I do not enjoy the moonlight much. All it does is shed a gleam on what should be left unlit.
These scars? They are healed up now. Rather than that... shouldn't you be asking what became of the ones that left them on me?
The sharpest blade has no meaning if it's not used.
Are you curious of my past? Such things... I cut them all off a long ago.
To tell you a secret, I can slay a foe with my eyes and ears closed. ...It was in jest. You truly are credulous, Dante.
Until now, a clock was nothing more than a useless object to me. Yours, however, has such a peculiar charm to it, Dante.
You're rather cold, turning away the moment a conversation ends.
I shall stay by your side until my sword breaks.
It's time to raise a deluge of blood.
Are you in need of this blade?
The sword is still sharp.
I shall carve the sin unto you.
It's a bloodshed.
Hmh...
A consequence of the scars.
This shan't leave a scar.
Scars signify experience.
It would seem I dug a grave.
I am relieved to see that they know to comply.
I shred them to pieces. My mind is clearer than ever.
My sword cut its fair share. Nothing stops me from accepting this result.
